Html:
Question about the new options for selecting a rotation.

I cast wrath until the +crit for starfire eclipse buff procs, cast starfire while this buff is active, then go back to wrath until it procs again.

So out of the options provided would I want to select the "smart spell switching for eclipse" as well as select "W spam" as my rotation option?

Thank You!

Varthara

http://www.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Draka&n=Varthara
You want to disable the Smart spell switching options, and pick one of the Wrath-based rotations, depending on which DoT effects you keep up during a fight.

So if "smart spell switching" is not for what I described in my rotation,

what exactly does it do?

/curious

I searched the rawr wiki for any info on this and did not see anything.
The rotation described by "Smart spell switching" would go as follows: Cast Wrath normally.  When Eclipse is ready to proc, switch to Starfire until it procs, then resume casting Wrath.
